creator: Ride Vision
descriptionHtml:
Ride Vision is a unique Advanced Rider Assistance System (ARAS) tailored to meet the safety needs of riders. Alerting only in life threatening situations, Ride Vision provides real time 360° protection for any motorbike and any rider.
Ride Vision’s unique system works by using two small wide-angle cameras mounted on the rear and front of the vehicle, that transmits footage to Ride Vision’s onboard processing unit, where a patented algorithm is used to detect and notify riders of collision threats in real-time.

Features and alerts:
Forward Collision Alert
Distance (proximity) Keeping Alert
Blind Spot Alert
Dangerous Overtake Alert
Auto-recording (rear and front cameras)

Features and alerts coming soon for subscribed users only:
Rear-Collision Alert
Forward-Side Collision Alert
Emergency Call
Auto Fun Video Clip (w/ ride data)
Video After Crash Lock (dashcam functionality)
Last Ride Highlights Video Clip
Riding Personal Assistant
Periodical Reporting Dashboard
Bluetooth audio alerts


**This app will only work if you have Ride Vision 1 installed on your vehicle and an active subscription plan**
If you purchased a product with no subscription plan please download 'Ride Vision Lite'.
descriptionShort: Ride Vision help motorcycle riders of all sizes to avoid accident in real time

descriptionShort: Ride Vision help motorcycle riders of all sizes to avoid accident in real time

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New design to help you better use the app
- New feature: Video sharing, just click the share icon after video downloaded
- Cancel and resume video download
- Better user experience:
- Easier way to sync rides, just swipe down to sync
- New settings screen
- Removed sync for 0km rides, less rides to scroll through, only showing real rides
- Multiple bug fixes and stability improvements

Ride Safe!

descriptionShort: Ride Vision help motorcycle riders of all sizes to avoid accident in real time

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ride Vision Android Update V1.1.2:
- New design to help you better use the app, new 'settings' screen
- New feature: Video sharing, just click the share icon after video downloaded
- Better user experience:
- Easier way to sync rides, just swipe down to sync
- New settings screen
You are now able to customize your unit:
- Control the frontal alert sensitivity levels
- Adjust the brightness of Led Indicators based on time of day
- Update your main unit Wi-Fi password
Ride Safe!

descriptionShort: Ride Vision help motorcycle riders of all sizes to avoid accident in real time

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Video recording- Choose whether to record ride videos or not. Default is off, so make sure to turn it back ON if needed.
- Delete Rides- Remove rides from the main screen
- Bluetooth connectivity- We added a new way to connect to your unit. At this time it only controls your unit settings.
- A new icon to show you rides with videos already downloaded
- Design updates: New BT icon and new connection colors.

- Multiple bug fixes and stability improvements

descriptionShort: Ride Vision help motorcycle riders of all sizes to avoid accident in real time

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW features:

- Video Vault: in case of an accident the video is cropped to 1 minute.
- Auto-sync Rides: Rides are now auto-synced in the background via Bluetooth.
- Video Preview: Review videos before downloading to your mobile.
- Bluetooth Rides Sync: Sync rides manually using Bluetooth.
- Super fast Wi-Fi rides sync.
- A new progress bar.
- General bug fixes and stability improvements.

* Please make sure your main unit is up to date (in the app under settings> Unit Update).
